## Source: ossf-package-analysis (705d265f51a6811b9f95fdbe239738b37767248d5e0b8b66cf689b122f4a96c9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vercel-edge' @ 99.5.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
